entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename unused variable to match similar usage #61790
  • DiagnosticAnalyzerService.GetDiagnosticsAsync does not return additional file diagnostics #61789
  • Metadata as source is collapsing empty accessors. #61788
  • Update ModuleMetadata to hold onto an object it can keep-alive. #61778
    C# 11.0
  • Unable to override severity of single rules when dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic.severity != unset|default #61777
  • Investigate VB assertion failure #61776
  • IDE0065: Global usings must not be places inside namespace #61773
    Backlog
  • StringCopyPaste test phyically write to the clipboard causing flakyness #61764
    17.3

Closed

  • Show warning if function return value is not used #61420
    Backlog
  • Move to namespace refactoring doesn't work with file-scoped namespace #61539
    17.3
  • VS17.2.3+ Rename symbol -> "rename symbols file" checkbox disabled #61726
    17.3
  • Issue: Lock Congestion using CSharpSyntaxRewriter #61716
  • .editorconfig doesn't affect ctrl-shift-B / command-line builds? #61724
    17.3
  • Convert switch statement to expression - incorrect 'OR' operator for fallthrough options #61468
    17.3
  • Natively supporting System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Scripting APIs #61445
  • js and css no code prompt in asp.net core project, say CSS Language Server (VSCode) failed to initialize #61769
  • Improved UX (error message) for generator users using outdated Roslyn version #61774
  • indentation is off when fixing up usings after a paste (32531.40.main) #61605
    17.3
  • Implementation of SourceUserDefinedOperatorSymbolBase.IsSelfConstrainedTypeParameter might need an adjustment once the design settles #53801
    C# 11.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't report operation canceled exceptions as faults #61787
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Add Move Static Member To Existing Type (#61519)" #61786
    Area-IDE
  • Use inline rename session options for all checkboxes directly #61785
    Area-IDE
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Fix lexing of the end of pp directives #61782
    Area-Compilers
  • Add asp.net extensibility hooks for embedded language brace matching #61779
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members without implementation as a type argument #61775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces

Merged

  • Add experimental option to semantic snippet experience #61750
    Area-IDE
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61780
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove LogPositionChanged, it's not needed for data anymore #61781
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add explanation of IDE design process and include template #61751
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update DartLab pipeline to use new agent template #61755
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Mark parameter that cannot be null as non-nullable #61766
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • [LSP] Disable sln crawler diagnostics when LSP pull is enabled #61396
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove ISupportDirectMemoryAccess. #61693
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Provide an extensibility point for embedded language brace highlighting #61756
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Highlight static local function use sites as static #61748
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61768
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61377
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61767
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Reducing allocations in completion #61620
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Include IndentBlockFormattingRule in AddMissingImportsService #61761
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61765
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove obsolete comments referencing an issue. #61740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove delegate and capture allocations #61719
    Area-IDE, Next
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61791
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Report an error for an implicit implementation of an inaccessible interface members #61717
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Check 'scoped' differences in overrides and interface implementations #61738
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Add telemetry dump of Options #61373
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate implementations of IPreprocessingSymbol #39201
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Annotate implementations of IRangeVariableSymbol #39202
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Annotate implementations of IPointerTypeSymbol #39203
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61754
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Require spaces within line span directives and relax LangVer check #61686
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #61669
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Filter out tracked document changes in semantic tokens handler #61760
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
